derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English watul, of unknown origin

encyclopedia.content: wattle【音标】 wattle ['wɔtl]【词义】 n. 编条，枝条编成的篱笆，板条 adj. 由编条做成，板条的 v. 用编条做成 n.金合欢树（附图）【例句】 There is a house with wattle fence in the picture . 图画里有一间带篱笆的小房子。牛津高阶英语词典的解释 wattle noun [U] sticks woven together as a material for making fences, walls, etc: walls made of wattle and daub [C] a piece of red skin that hangs down f

entry.tran: (用以编筑篱笆及围墙的)枝条构架
entry.def: Wattle is a framework made by weaving thin sticks through thick sticks which is used for making fences and walls.

example.ex: ...the native huts of mud and wattle.
example.tran: 当地用泥巴和枝条盖起的小屋

means.word_mean: 1. a fleshy wrinkled and often brightly colored fold of skin hanging from the neck or throat of certain birds (chickens and turkeys) or lizards
2. framework consisting of stakes interwoven with branches to form a fence
